Class ToggleButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • Button
      • ToggleButton

  • public class ToggleButton
extends Button
    this is an extension of the button class to allow the button to have states, an example would be the top button in the option screen, it swaps between two states > keyboard and mouse
    Author:
    elan
